long_description: Don't settle for instant coffee while backpacking. GSI Outdoors Java Mill features an adjustable, ceramic conical burr grinder and weighs only 9.3 oz. so you can enjoy high-quality coffee anywhere. Smooth ceramic bearing makes hand-grinding easy; durable copolyester exterior withstands frequent use. Sturdy alloy handle nests down the side of the Java Mill for easy packing. GSI Outdoors Java Mill measures 6.3 x 2.5 x 2 in., fitting easily in your pack.
short_description: Don't settle for instant coffee while backpacking. GSI Outdoors Java Mill features an adjustable, ceramic conical burr grinder and weighs only 9.3 oz. so you can enjoy high-quality coffee anywhere.
